DILUTE BEFORE USE. SUGGESTED DILUTION RATIO: 2-4% - www.wonderflavours.com

"...SC should be started standalone at 1% up to 4%" - Frank EBlender | WFlavors |11/2017
_________________________________________________________________
**9/26/2017**


SF Test: **3.25%** | 60/40 | Wasp Nano | Organic Japanese Cotton | 40 Watts

 


‚ñ∫**First Impressions (24 hour steep ‚úî)**

‚Ä¢ Knuckle Test: Smell & Taste: 

**Aroma Intensity:** Medium / Strong  | Roasted Sesame Seeds covered with a Thick Fried Dough 

---Moderate Sweetness | Creamy | Strong flavor of Toasted or Roasted Sesame & Heavy Fried "oily" Dough
_________________________________________________________________
**10/03/2017 (1 Week Steep ‚úî)**

 


‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle Aroma:**  Intensity Unchanged | Sesame Seeds Slightly Dominant over Thick Fried Dough

‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:**  Light Sweetness | Toasted or Roasted Sesame Seeds / Yeast like Dough fried in Sesame Oil 

‚Ä¢ **Vape:** Very Aromatic | Flavor Intensity Strong | "Salty" & Semi-Sweet Dough/Bakery Fried In Sesame Oil 

--- Full Body | Thick Mouth Feel - Dense, Powdery, and Semi - Drying


‚ñ∫ **Notes**

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: None
_________________________________________________________________
**10/10/2017 (2 Week Steep ‚úî)**

 


‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle Aroma:** Very Slight ‚Üì Intensity = Med.Strong
    
‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** Med.Sweetness | More Balanced Sesame / Oil & Fried Dough

‚Ä¢**Vape:** Overall Unchanged from Wk 1 

---| Slight  ‚Üì in Flavor Intensity & Sweetness (Med. Strong) | More Oil Fried Dough - Dominant with Roasted Sesame Seeds

---|  Slight ‚Üì in Body = Med | Overall Semi Dry & Mod. Mouth Feel

‚ñ∫**Notes**

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: Light Tartness at End
_________________________________________________________________
**10/17/017 (3 Week Steep ‚úî) FINAL** ü•á 

 


‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle Aroma:** Unchanged from Wk 2 ‚úì

Mod. Strong Aroma Intensity  | Toasted Sesame Seeds covered with a Thick Fried "Oily" Dough

‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** Unchanged from Wk 2 ‚úì

Mod. Sweet | Toasted Sesame Seeds over a Heavy Fried Oily Dough

‚Ä¢ **Vape:** Overall Unchanged from Wk 1 & 2 ‚úì

Flavor Intensity Mod. Strong | Light Sweetness | "Warm" Oil Fried Dough - Dominant, Fully coated with Toasted Sesame Seeds

--- Med.Heavy Body | Overall Semi Dry & Mod. Mouth Feel

‚ñ∫ **Notes**

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: None / Hint of a Tart Note

‚Ä¢ Uses: Bakeries, Pastries, & Desserts / Sesame "Candy" - possible
***
